name: Yoi Shiroi Gohan
description:
Welcome To Yoi Shiroi Gohan a cute 2D Side Scroller where Onigiri a small Shiba Inu dog, has to fight his biggest Nemesis the Big Mad Hydrant.

In his fight to glory, Onigiri jumps from cloud to cloud and is equipped with nothing but his Sushi gun to shoot the enemy and dodge all attacks on his path to victory レッカー! To Win, power-up your gun with White Rice and save the world! 楽しんで!
